prompt: Photorealistic close-up of a variety of antique bottles arranged on a weathered wooden table in a dimly lit antique shop. The bottles are of different shapes, sizes, and colors (amber, green, cobalt blue, clear), some with embossed lettering. Soft, diffused light from a nearby window highlights the details of the glass and the dust motes in the air. Focus is sharp on the center bottles, with a shallow depth of field blurring the background. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.1
name: antique-bottle-identification-image-1.png

prompt: A high-angle, photorealistic shot of an expert's hands carefully holding and examining an antique bottle against a light box. The bottle is an unusual shade of purple and has a pontil scar on the base. The expert is using a magnifying glass to inspect the bottle's markings. The background is a clean, white workspace. The image is well-lit with even lighting to showcase the details. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6 --zoom 1.2
name: antique-bottle-identification-image-2.png

prompt: Photorealistic image of a dusty attic filled with antique bottles illuminated by a single shaft of sunlight. Bottles of various shapes and sizes are scattered across the floor and shelves, some broken, some intact. The sunlight catches the dust particles in the air, creating a sense of age and mystery. The scene is slightly desaturated, with a warm color palette. Composition emphasizes the depth of the attic. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.05 --v 6
name: antique-bottle-identification-image-3.png

prompt: A photorealistic macro shot focusing on the embossed lettering of an antique glass bottle. The lettering is slightly worn and filled with dirt, highlighting the age of the bottle. The background is blurred, showing the texture of the glass. The lighting is dramatic, with a strong side light emphasizing the details of the embossing and creating deep shadows. The color palette is limited to browns, greens, and ambers. --ar 16:9 --style raw --zoom 1.3
name: antique-bottle-identification-image-4.png

prompt: Photorealistic image of an antique bottle fragment found during an archeological dig. The fragment is partially buried in the earth, surrounded by other artifacts like pottery shards and rusted metal. The lighting is natural, mimicking midday sun, casting shadows and highlighting the textures of the earth and the broken glass. The background is a blurred landscape showing the dig site. The color palette is earthy and muted. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6 --zoom 1.1
name: antique-bottle-identification-image-5.png
